title: Creamy chocolate pie
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '110g butter, softened', '120g finely chopped walnuts', '225g cream cheese, softened', '120g icing sugar', '250ml double cream, whipped', '225g instant chocolate dessert mix, such as Angel Delight', '475ml milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '45g chocolate, grated']
